mapper.sql: outbound_id, pick_head_id, outbound_no, outbound_time, ship_time, `status`, create_time, dr
mapper.select:
select
from om_outbound where outbound_id = #{outboundId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and dr = 1
mapper.insert: insert into om_outbound (outbound_id, pick_head_id, outbound_no, outbound_time, ship_time, `status`, create_time, dr) values (#{outboundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outboundNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{outboundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})

outbound_id,

mapper.update:
update om_outbound
pick_head_id = #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
outbound_no = #{outboundNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
outbound_time = #{outboundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ship_time = #{shipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where outbound_id = #{outboundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update om_outbound set pick_head_id = #{pickHeadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, outbound_no = #{outboundNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, outbound_time = #{outboundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ship_time = #{shipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where outbound_id = #{outboundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: o.outbound_id, o.pick_head_id, o.outbound_no, o.outbound_time, o.ship_time, o.`status`, o.create_time, o.dr, ph.pick_no, ph.order_no, ph.order_type, ph.correspond_project, ph.plan_time
mapper.select:
select
from om_outbound o left join om_pick_head ph on o.pick_head_id = ph.pick_head_id where o.dr = 1 and ph.dr = 1 and ph.order_type = #{otype,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and o.outbound_no like '%' #{ono,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
and ph.pick_no like '%' #{pno,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
and ph.correspond_project like '%' #{cproject,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
and o.`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by o.create_time desc

select
from om_outbound o left join om_pick_head ph on o.pick_head_id = ph.pick_head_id where o.dr = 1 and ph.dr = 1 and o.outbound_id = #{oId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
